creator: Ryan.Lubke@Sun.COM
text:
The SetBufferSize_1TestServlet expects that an IllegalStateException is thrown
if any attempt to modify the buffersize after an initial size has been set.  The
spec is currenly vague in wording.  Unlike other methods in this class, there is
no explicit mention of the response being commited in order for an
IllegalStateException to occur.  

The wording will most likely be updated for 2.4.
